metadata.description: All motorhome parking spots, campsites, storage facilities, service points, and attractions

description.en: Free organized parking for motorhomes available in every city in northern Spain. Includes drinking water fill point, toilet waste dump station, and grey water drainage. Usually full but spots can always be found or very nearby.

fullAddress.en: Various cities in Northern Spain

notes.en: Completely free

text.en: In recent days I'm traveling in northern Spain, and to my surprise (assuming you're not surprised) every city has a free organized parking for motorhomes. Includes drinking water fill point, toilet waste dump, and grey water drainage. Usually these spots are quite full, but you can always find a place, or a very close location. This gives a good feeling, and I hope this exists in more countries...
Also very common in Italy and Portugal

description.en: Free overnight parking available in England. As the saying goes: 'Free is cheap, we still haven't checked it.'

fullAddress.en: Various locations in England

notes.en: Free overnight parking, verification needed

description.en: Must-visit bakery/cafÃ© in Lisbon serving the most delicious chocolate cake. Worth a flight just for this cake! Essential stop for anyone visiting Lisbon.

fullAddress.en: Lisbon, Portugal

notes.en: CafÃ©/bakery pricing

text.en: Chocolate cake worth a special flight... For anyone visiting Lisbon...

name.en: Coves de Sant Josep (Rio SubterrÃ¡neo de San JosÃ©)

description.en: Underground river system stretching 3 kilometers. A magical place near Valencia recommended for motorhome travelers.

fullAddress.en: Coves de Sant Josep, Near Valencia, Spain

notes.en: Tourist attraction with entrance fee

text.en: Magical place if you haven't been there yet. Underground river of 3km.
I'll be in the area at the beginning of March and already adding this place to my map.
When searching on Google it appears as 'Coves de Sant Josep'

description.en: Excellent overnight parking in a charming Moroccan village. Shared by traveler during Morocco journey.

fullAddress.en: Morocco (specific village location in map link)

notes.en: Free overnight parking

text.en: The parking for the night... Charming village. Excellent parking!!

description.en: Campground used for Berlin visits. Worth checking for availability though not specifically confirmed for long-term storage.

fullAddress.en: Near Berlin, Germany (specific location in map link)

notes.en: Contact for pricing - not confirmed for long-term storage

text.en: We stayed there during a Berlin visit. Not sure about long term but worth checking.
Storage near Berlin is difficult - most places are full, likely to have availability in June

description.en: Excellent overnight parking one meter from the sea! Near Girona, Spain. Has everything and quality. Includes restaurant (not bad) and excellent mini-market. Highly recommended.

fullAddress.en: Near Girona, Catalonia, Spain (specific location in map link)

notes.en: Contact for pricing - ACSI card accepted

text.en: Friends, another excellent overnight parking!!! One meter from the sea! Near Girona/Spain. Highly recommended. Has everything and quality! Including not-bad restaurant and excellent mini-market.
ACSI card is very nice but not in high season. Effective now, especially in France.

description.en: Amazing parking lot that has everything! Cheap, close to train station, perfect base for visiting Amalfi Coast via train, Naples, ancient Roman city of Pompeii, and neighboring Herculaneum. Absolutely brilliant strategy.

fullAddress.en: Pompeii, Campania, Italy (specific location in map link)

notes.en: Cheap parking - contact for exact rates

text.en: I recommend everyone to park in Pompeii - amazing parking lot that has everything! Cheap, close to train, and simply brilliant - every day you take the train to Amalfi line, get off at any city you want along the coast, or jump to Naples. And of course, a must-visit to the Roman city Pompeii and neighboring Roman city Herculaneum - simply a must!!!
We parked there the last two days, definitely recommended and very convenient.
Perfect strategy to avoid Amalfi Coast road restrictions for motorhomes - park here and use train for daily trips
Say hello from Amir, Osnat from Israel and the poodle Ted

description.en: Free parking with no services at Lisbon port. Park right on the water. Beautiful promenade from port and convenient public transportation in area. Very pleasant location.

fullAddress.en: Lisbon Port, Lisbon, Portugal (specific location in map link)

notes.en: Completely free - no services available

text.en: We parked in Lisbon port - free parking with no services at all. We loved it very much. There are other caravans of course, parked right on the water, from the port there's a beautiful promenade and convenient public transportation in the area.
No services available - water, electricity, or dump stations

name.en: Large Campground Near Lisbon with Full Connectivity

description.en: Huge campground near Lisbon. Can connect in any way you choose. City is very large. Uber available and cheap. Decathlon across the road within morning walk distance.

fullAddress.en: Near Lisbon, Portugal (specific location in map link)

notes.en: Contact for pricing

text.en: We stayed in this campground a few months ago. Huge, you can connect in any way you choose. The city is very large. Uber available and cheap. (And on the other side of the road within morning walk distance is Decathlon for supplies)

description.en: Parking facility near Athens airport with motorhome storage. Offers pickup from airport terminal. Located 5 minutes from airport. Will NOT pick up from seaport.

fullAddress.en: 5 minutes from Athens Airport

notes.en: Price not specified
Contact card shared in chat (vcf file)

text.en: We stored there for a period. 5 minutes from the airport, including pickup from the terminal. They will not pick up the vehicle from seaport.
Customs clearance for vehicles arriving by ferry/maritime shipping in countries outside EU agreement requires driver/owner presence with customs fees and paperwork

description.en: Overnight parking for motorhomes near Athens. Excellent facility with amenities.

fullAddress.en: Near Athens - see website

notes.en: Price not specified

text.en: Also this is excellent. We stayed there for a night in the parking lot.

description.en: Very organized parking facility 11 minutes from Athens airport. Less noisy than other options, suitable for overnight stays. Mentioned as alternative to U Save parking.

fullAddress.en: 11 minutes from Athens Airport

notes.en: Price not specified

text.en: We parked at both the mentioned parking and this other one (link below). The second is very organized 11 minutes from the airport. The first is a bit makeshift and if you stay overnight there's noise from traffic most hours of the day as it sits on a main intersection.
Better choice for overnight parking if you want quiet - unlike U Save which sits on busy intersection

name.en: Free Motorhome Parking Lisbon - BelÃ©m Area

description.en: Free parking spots in Lisbon convenient for public transport. Two nearby locations provided. Walking distance to Lidl supermarket (7 minutes). Near gas station with drinking water tap for filling motorhome tanks.

fullAddress.en: BelÃ©m area, Lisbon - see Google Maps links

notes.en: Completely free

text.en: Received 2 free spots. The two first ones look excellent. The first two are close, if the parking lot is full... then park on the other side, there's a supermarket within walking distance. 7 minutes walk to Lidl - fruits and vegetables cheap, dairy cheap... and chain products cheap.
Two locations provided - if one is full, try the other nearby
Cheap gas station with drinking water tap for tank filling nearby

notes.en: Google Maps links provided in chat: https://maps.app.goo.gl/uXfDVLGDx3hgJJvp6, https://maps.app.goo.gl/4u8gSwxyH9pymfGu5, https://maps.app.goo.gl/aNWmMrmMuLWKG6PPA

name.en: Motorhome Storage and Gas Refill - South of Lisbon

description.en: Storage facility south of Lisbon with gas bottle refilling services. Not cheap but provides good storage. Details to be shared after user verifies quality.

fullAddress.en: South of Lisbon - exact location to be provided

notes.en: Not cheap - price not specified

text.en: For those arriving in the area, I have good storage here although not cheap, and also a place to fill gas bottles. South of Lisbon, there are probably more. After I see how the storage is, I'll send details.

notes.en: User will provide more details after verifying quality

name.en: Parking near Geneva Airport - French Side

description.en: Long-term parking for motorhomes near Geneva Airport on the French side. More affordable than Swiss side parking options.

fullAddress.en: French side of Geneva Airport

notes.en: Cheaper than Swiss side

text.en: French side of Geneva airport is cheaper for long-term parking than Swiss side

description.en: Motorhome storage facility near SchÃ¶nefeld Airport in Berlin. Offers storage services with accessibility to Berlin Airport. Professional storage facility for long-term parking.

fullAddress.en: Waltersdorfer Ch 100, 12529 SchÃ¶nefeld, Germany

notes.en: Price not specified - contact for rates

text.en: Close to Berlin SchÃ¶nefeld Airport, convenient for flights

description.en: Secure parking facility with services for motorhomes near Hamburg Airport. Located about 5 minutes drive from the airport. Features 24/7 access, over 165 spacious parking spots, paved and lit parking area, security cameras. Suitable for long-term parking.

fullAddress.en: An'n Slagboom 41, 22848 Norderstedt, Germany

notes.en: Starting from 2.50 EUR per day, varies depending on period and duration
Can book online or by phone

text.en: 165+ spacious parking spaces - good availability
5 minutes from Hamburg Airport

geocoding.displayName: Wein Zwei Drei, 41, An'n Slagboom, NettelkrÃ¶gen, Garstedt, Norderstedt, Kreis Segeberg, Schleswig-Holstein, 22848, Deutschland

name.en: Sanchez Martinez Campervan Storage - Bergen, Norway

description.en: Storage facility near Bergen, Norway operated by Sanchez Martinez. Dealer who rents private caravans and offers long-term storage for motorhomes. Recommended for southern Norway storage needs.

fullAddress.en: Near Bergen, Norway - contact Sanchez for exact location

notes.en: Price not specified
Contact card (VCF) shared in chat: -0001962-Sanchez ×¡×× ×©×¡ Martinez Campervan Bergen.vcf

text.en: We stored near Bergen a year ago. Contact is Sanchez. He is a dealer who rents private caravans.
Suitable for long-term storage in southern Norway, Denmark, or southern Sweden region

description.en: Iconic red rock formation in the heart of Australia. A dream destination for adventurous motorhome travelers. Massive sandstone monolith sacred to Aboriginal people.

fullAddress.en: Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park, Northern Territory, Australia

notes.en: National park entry fees apply

text.en: Heart of Australia. Uluru. Couldn't resist sharing this one.
This trip was done with motorcycle, but location is accessible by motorhome as well

notes.en: Shared as aspirational destination - traveler has blog about the journey

geocoding.query: Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park, Northern Territory, Australia
geocoding.displayName: Uluá¹Ÿu-Kata Tjuá¹¯a National Park, Northern Territory, Australia

name.en: Morgan Motor Company Factory Tour - Malvern, Wales

description.en: Factory tour of Morgan Motors, a legendary British car manufacturer producing handcrafted sports cars for over 100 years using traditional methods. An experience for all craft lovers - more than 100 years of handwork just like in the old days. Cars are still built by hand with wooden frames and traditional coachbuilding techniques.

fullAddress.en: Morgan Motor Company, Pickersleigh Road, Malvern, Worcestershire, UK

notes.en: Factory tour booking required - check website for pricing

text.en: Today we visited the Morgan Motors factory. An experience for all craft lovers. More than a hundred years of handwork just like in the old days.
This is amazing... a skill that disappeared from the world. Everything today is CNC and laser, but it lacks the character of the curves of old cars, in my opinion.
Book factory tours in advance - this is a working factory with limited visitor access
Located in botanical park area of Wales - good to combine with nature visit

notes.en: Multiple photos shared of handcrafted wooden frames and traditional manufacturing

geocoding.query: Morgan Motor Company, Pickersleigh Road, Malvern, Worcestershire, UK
geocoding.displayName: Morgan Motor Company, Pickersleigh Road, Malvern Link, Malvern, Malvern Hills, Worcestershire, England, WR14 2RT, United Kingdom

description.en: Location where diesel fuel injection pump failure occurred. Useful reference point for motorhome service needs in eastern Belgium. Coordinates provided for exact location.

fullAddress.en: See coordinates: 50.671955, 4.907385

notes.en: Emergency breakdown location

text.en: Diesel fuel injection pump air leak issues can occur in this region - see related guide for troubleshooting

notes.en: Location shared during active breakdown troubleshooting - Google Maps link: https://maps.google.com/?q=50.671955,4.907385

description.en: Mountain pass circuit in the Dolomites featuring multiple passes including Passo Fedare and Passo Giau. Popular motorhome route with scenic mountain roads. Parking: Passo Fedare head parking (toll â‚¬10 per day + â‚¬20 for overnight). Good parking on west side of pass.

en: Mountain road challenge testing vehicle clearance

cost.en: â‚¬10 per day (Passo Fedare) + â‚¬20 for overnight

description.en: Temporary sculpture garden in Valloire featuring straw and hay sculptures. Located in tourist area with walking paths and sculpture installations.

Excellent motorhome campground close to Andorra border at 1450 meters elevation. Well-maintained facility with full amenities, approximately 40 motorhome capacity, peaceful location. Cost: â‚¬17.30 per night including all services (water, sewage, electricity). Cold nights (around 6-8Â°C in July).

climate.en: Cool nights around 6-8Â°C in July, heating needed

description.en: Excellent motorhome-friendly camp in nature reserve with private lake, warm family atmosphere. Located in Shivaniq nature reserve. Last 9km of access road is unpaved but easily passable for all vehicle types. Listed on Park4night. Israeli community present at location.

access.en: 9km unpaved but passable for all vehicle types (light vehicles fine)

description.en: Monthly motorhome parking options near Geneva airport. French side is significantly cheaper than Swiss side. Multiple parking options available with advance booking.

en: Search on French side for better prices

description.en: Mountain region in southern France where Ilan was located. Currently experiencing summer weather with rain and thunderstorms. Good for overnight camping with electric hookup.

notes.en: Located between Perpignan and Montpellier area

description.en: Beautiful scenic area in Israel. Mentioned as a parking location with excellent views.

notes.en: Romantic location with natural beauty

description.en: Scenic viewpoint in Norway near the town of Flam. Accessible via a scenic road (E16) that bypasses a 20+ km long tunnel. Excellent photography location with stunning mountain views.

en: Scenic E16 road avoiding long tunnel

description.en: Long-term motorhome storage options in Paris area. Several facilities available with monthly fees ranging from â‚¬70-â‚¬75.

notes.en: Farm-like facility. Recommended by Rami Galboa.
Nice campground near storage facility. Accepts ACSI cards if available.

storageFacilities.distance: 10 minutes from Charles de Gaulle Airport

notes.en: Option full, looking for alternatives

locations.sharedBy: itzik, Amit Raphaeli, Rami Galboa, Jorge

description.en: Family-run workshop in Rieti, Italy specializing in motorhome, camper, and caravan repairs and modifications. Excellent service and fair pricing. Recommended by Amir Malzer.

specialNote.en: Owner Barbara is highly respected. Family atmosphere with excellent service.

description.en: Farm location near Pretoria with technical expert owner. Offers closed shed storage and mechanical assistance for motorhomes. Good for post-journey repairs and maintenance.

notes.en: Good location for post-journey maintenance. Owner has extensive local connections in the area.

description.en: City in Poland mentioned as a rainy travel destination
Hotel near Hallstatt where Ron Kellner was stopped by police for arriving late (after 20:00). Illustrates local enforcement of rules and different cultural expectations.

anecdote.en: Hotel owner called police for late arrival. Officers explained it's routine - they get cases like this weekly. Emphasizes importance of respecting local rules.

description.en: Rural church parking where Ron Kellner spent the night. Local residents saw he was Israeli tourist, invited him to wedding celebration.

anecdote.en: Invited to local wedding celebration - positive cultural exchange. Shows contrast between places that welcome travelers and those that don't.

description.en: City where Israeli tourists' rented motorhome was broken into and robbed while visiting a museum. Critical security warning for travelers.

safetyWarning.en: Break-in and robbery - all documents, clothes stolen. Credit cards fortunately on person.

description.en: Capital where robbed tourists were assisted by Israeli embassy on Monday. Location for embassy support for traveling citizens.

services.en: Israeli embassy support for travel emergencies

name.en: Queen's Gardens area (Sydney or similar), nearby small town

description.en: Small town near major city where motorhome was broken into and computer stolen from street parking

safetyWarning.en: Break-in and theft from street parking - loss of computer and electronics

description.en: Region where motorhome storage needed. Major city with camping facilities and storage options.
Large camping site in Milan with storage services
Remote destination where Ron Kellner seeks motorhome storage information

name.en: Piemonte (Piedmont), Italy - Macadamia nut farm agriturismo

description.en: Enormous farm and vineyard (producing 150,000 bottles of wine per year) with macadamia nut orchards and agriturismo accommodation. Highly recommended camping and tourism destination.

en: Shower facilities in ancient wine barrel

highlights.en: Beautiful scenic area, wonderful family, gift of 3kg macadamia nuts, exceptional wine tourism experience

rating.en: Highly recommended - exceptional value and experience

description.en: Greek city where motorhome is currently located. Base for month-long European tour planned by new group members.
Town with train connection to Milan (Malpensa) Airport for convenient airport transit
Coastal city in France where motorhome storage needed for short-term (few days)
Coastal city in Portugal seeking recommendation for long-term motorhome parking area
Storage facility area in southern Germany between Konstanz Lake and Munich. Notable for convenient access to Memmingen airport with budget Ryanair flights to Israel.

en: Angela Bradl Camper Storage (near Munich airport)

details.en: Leutkirsh is a small town on A96 autobahn, 30 minutes north of Konstanz Lake and 30 minutes by shuttle from Memmingen airport. Cost approximately â‚¬1.70/day. Storage facility often full but worth checking for availability.

notes.en: Contact: Angela Bradl for Munich area; Contact local German network for Leutkirsh

description.en: Motorhome storage facility in northern Germany, Hamburg area. Details to be obtained from German local network.
Cultural destination in Poland. Museum of freedom mentioned as highly recommended even for those who don't usually enjoy museums.
Sports location in Poland hosting Israeli basketball national team matches.
Motorhome parking location in England shared by Nadav. Appears to be scenic location based on photos shared.
Beautiful mountain road in Montenegro, recommended for motorhome travel. Described as excellent route from Qutor.

relatedPeople.en: Rami Galboa shared connection; Oran Kipnis friend collecting Citroens

description.en: Jorge passing through Switzerland, entering Germany in three days
Travel route from Basel (Switzerland) to Hamburg (Germany) requiring CitroÃ«n mechanic assistance
Three-river region (Nadam festival location). Extremely difficult weather conditions. Features local customs including Mongolian horse fermented milk (kumiss)

en: Nadam festival - three concurrent festivals at once
Very difficult for digestion - fermented horse milk

description.en: Italy trip destination. Ilan planned to arrive from September 28th. Meeting point with coffee
Region in Italy. Jump from Mongolia to Umbria in Italy
Free parking location with stunning park and facilities. Major attractions in Rome
Amazing mineral springs. Free parking with giant parking area. Excellent location close to group. Amazing hot springs for natural bathing

recommendation.en: Highly recommended for those who love hot springs

description.en: Amazing mineral springs. Free parking with giant parking area. High-quality people in the area
Storage location inquiry. User looking for free vehicle storage in secure facility near Budapest

requirement.en: Storage facility near city with garage coverage and free shuttle service

description.en: Tom Lerner storing motorhome in Eastern Germany with experienced CitroÃ«n/PSA mechanic

Seven-month family motorhome journey across South America. Met motorhome in Montevideo, traveled south through Argentina and Chile via Carretera Austral and Route 40 to Torres del Paine, then north through Argentina, Chile, Andes, Peru, Ecuador, Galapagos, and Colombia

en: Torres del Paine in Chilean Patagonia

description.en: Active volcano in Ecuador, notable for dramatic mountain scenery. Sleeping location mentioned during South America motorhome journey. Rain weather experienced.
Amazon rainforest area visited during South America motorhome journey. Featured in travel photos with remarkable nature scenery.
Natural hot springs area in Tivoli, Italy. Recommendation to visit thermal springs in nature (Parco di Villa d'Este region). Near Rome.

One of Italy's most beautiful roads. Very narrow in many places, historically restricted from large camper traffic. Best driven with sun behind you (not facing sun). Scenic mountain road with tight curves.

restrictions.en: Large motorhomes restricted - narrow road, max vehicle size approximately Vito-class

notes.en: 1-hour YouTube video available about this road. Successfully driven by experienced travelers with smaller motorhomes.

description.en: Motorhome parking area accessible via Park4Night platform. Located in Europe region.

Large state in USA with vast ranches, affordable prices relative to USA, hot summers and cold winters. Mixed weather year-round (no perfect climate). Recently visited by travelers searching for farm property.

climate.en: Hot summers, cold winters, no perfect weather

name.en: Portugal and Spain Free Caravan Areas

description.en: Extensive network of free parking areas with water and waste disposal facilities. Located on periphery of towns and villages. Search terms: 'free caravans area' or 'Municipal caravans parking' in Google Maps. Many surprise-worthy options.

en: Many free parking areas have water/disposal access
Google Maps search yields many results

description.en: Mountain pass in the Dolomites region, modest but beautiful scenery
Mountain viewpoint accessible by cable car (gondola) and hiking trails. Historic cable car available at nearby restaurant (Toni de Metz). Viewing platform at the top.

en: Hiking trail to summit (1+ hour each way)

description.en: Free dock-side parking in Lisbon, 20 minutes from the city center by Uber. Waterfront location with tidal views (twice daily tide changes). Spacious dock suitable for large motorhomes.

notes.en: Free parking

en: Wide dock suitable for large vehicles

description.en: Restaurant and hotel in the town of Alba, not far from Lisbon. Highly recommended for dinner with advance reservation and menu ordering (at least 1 day prior). Expensive but worth every euro. Close parking available within walking distance (1 minute).

name.en: Praia da foz de Sizandro - Free Motorhome Parking

description.en: Municipal parking 80km north of Lisbon at the confluence of a river and Atlantic Ocean. Stunning sand dunes and hiking trails. Limited to 72-hour stays. Small parking area (8-10 caravans capacity), but additional large free parking available nearby. Water refill point for caravanists. Isolated and free.

notes.en: Free, limited to 72 hour stays

description.en: Historic town 254km north of Lisbon featuring traditional waterways and decorated gondolas. Tourist destination. Large free parking areas available (asphalt fields), not very scenic but practical. Better suited for standard campers than large motorhomes.

notes.en: Free parking

name.en: Caldaria de Lobios Hot Springs - Spain

description.en: Hot springs location in Spain mentioned as excellent stop despite being in urban setting. Good for motorhome travelers.
Spanish city highly recommended for motorhome travelers visiting the Iberian Peninsula.
Professional and efficient auto repair shop recommended by a campground in Madrid. Professional workmanship with reasonable prices. Specializes in motorhome repairs including water pump replacement.

Charming cafÃ© full of young people with computers, offering famous apple cake reminiscent of movies. Located 500-800 meters north along the waterfront with modern buildings on the left and water on the right. Recommended for excellent food and atmosphere.

address.en: Lisbon, Portugal - along the waterfront north

en: Great place to work with WiFi

transit.en: Direct bus to PraÃ§a do ComÃ©rcio in Lisbon (bus 728), or taxi for 6-8 euros for two people

name.en: Fivizzano Municipal Car Park, Tuscany, Italy

description.en: Municipal parking in Fivizzano, Tuscany with excellent facilities including electricity, waste disposal, water filling, and free WiFi. Free parking (gratuita). Perfect for exploring the Tuscan countryside and charming villages at 20 km/h.

nearbyAttractions.en: Charming Tuscan villages, Cinque Terre area

description.en: Beautiful vineyard location in Tuscany with a location pin shared. Wine owner welcomes tastings for wine enthusiasts. Scenic wine region ideal for motorhome travel.
Recommended parking spot with excellent photo documentation showing parking quality and facilities

name.en: Gas Refill Service Center - Slovenia (Italy Border)

description.en: Gas supply center that fills all types of gas cylinders. Professional service with excellent customer relations. Solves gas filling problems for travelers with different gas tank standards across Europe.
Excellent food truck location with abundant parking. Parking is on a slope requiring 20cm blocks for leveling. Great for eating while traveling.
Closed hangar storage with nice facilities. Located 70km and 1.5 hours southwest of Paris. Suitable for monthly/bi-monthly motorhome storage near Paris region.
Storage facility for motorhome near Mainz, Germany. Contact: Yaakov Kobi Khaimowitz (Israeli resident in Mainz). Flexible monthly rates.

notes.en: Flexible monthly rates, no fixed amount mentioned

description.en: Storage facility for motorhome approximately 70km south of Stuttgart, Germany. Owner uncertain about availability, but willing to check.
Storage facility available near Strasbourg, France. For inquiries about availability.

notes.en: â‚¬70 per month, flexible rates

accessibility.en: Flexible, offers short and long-term options

description.en: Currently parking on a farm close to Mainz, Germany. Suitable for motorhome parking.
Seeking storage facility for Prado vehicle in Perth, Australia for 1-2 months. Safe and reliable facility needed.
Chabad house in Zurich where a rabbi visited to install mezuzahs in a motorhome (camper)

notes.en: Starting price depending on period and length of stay. Personal vehicle rate - motorhome rates being negotiated.

description.en: Caravan storage location in Rostock, Germany. Two hours drive from Hamburg area. Contact Jorge for details.

notes.en: Suitable for May-September 2026 storage needs

description.en: Affordable motorhome storage facility in South Germany near Munich airport. Covered parking with daily rate of 1.75 EUR per day. Close to airport with direct flights to Israel (Ben Gurion) on regular days.

notes.en: 1.75 EUR per day for covered storage

description.en: Comprehensive interactive Google Map of motorhome storage locations across Europe, maintained by Rami Galboa and Ilan. Click on 'P' markers to view full information about each storage location. Community members can submit new locations for inclusion.

Motorhome destination planned for summer travel. Ferry journey from Denmark to Iceland (30 hours) with planned stops at Faroe Islands (15 hours additional). Route planning for road travel with glacier-fed river crossings.

tips.en: Glacier-fed rivers are deeper in afternoons due to glacial melt. Better to cross in early morning.

description.en: Stopover destination between Denmark and Iceland. One-week planned visit as part of summer route. Ferry stop from Denmark (15 hours).

Multi-country off-road travel including Carretera Austral in Chile, Route 40 in Argentina, and Coquena Pass between countries. Mountain passes, glacial lakes, and remote terrain requiring off-road vehicle capability.

highlights.en: Carretera Austral and Route 40 - scenic gravel roads
Coquena Pass - remote off-road crossing between Chile and Argentina
Cueva de los Manos - historic archaeological site
Villa O'Higgins - southern terminus of Carretera Austral

tips.en: Ripio (gravel roads) require reduced tire pressure and accelerating for traction
Limited paved roads; zigzag between Chile and Argentina for variety
Paper maps recommended alongside technology for navigation
Bajo Caracoles fuel station - bring cash and prepare substantial funds

description.en: Annual tax and fees information for motorhome registration in Germany. Annual mandatory fee of â‚¬240 (or â‚¬72-84 depending on vehicle value) plus insurance and other regular costs.

en: Annual registration fee: â‚¬240 (can vary â‚¬72-84 based on vehicle value)

tips.en: Fee goes to Bundes Kasse (federal treasury). Not a scam - legitimate mandatory cost.
Vehicle value affects tax amount (â‚¬50K vehicle example)
France has lower registration costs (â‚¬230 one-time fee only)

description.en: Location referenced in context of buying engine oil for a generator while traveling.
General European travel discussion including Spain, France, Poland, and other destinations. Focus on road networks and off-road capabilities.

tips.en: Small rural roads throughout Europe offer better scenery and local encounters than highways
2WD sufficient for most European travel on paved and easy gravel roads

description.en: Travel route through Mongolia with local SIM card usage. Global SIM initially unsuccessful; local SIM card (cost: 1.5 NIS) proved highly reliable and functional.

tips.en: Local SIM cards often more reliable than global roaming plans
Global SIM roaming had coverage issues despite promises

name.en: Oren Crispin Motorhome Custom Building (Builder Location)

description.en: World-class custom motorhome builder. Builds to world standard. Mentioned as location to purchase/build custom motorhomes with international quality standards.

notes.en: Builder offers option to return motorhome to Israel after one year of travel (half year trip, half year return - total one year journey)
